name: Skungeon
description:
Skungeon is a Rogue-Lite, Dungeon-Crawling RPG with inspirations from Darkest Dungeon, Slay The Spire and Thea: The Awakening. 

This is a prototype and will be frequently updated! The web version has a crashing bug that I'm working on, so will be available later.

Please leave a comment if you have: found a bug, enjoy the game or have some feedback. Thanks!
